{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=Archer C8 |revision=v1.x |series=AC1750 |asin=B00N2ROH0C |newegg=N82E16833704220 |fcc_date=08/22/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |type=wireless router |fcc_id=TE7C8 |ic_id=8853A-C8 |pcb_id=2050500322 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4708A0 |cpu1_cspeed=800 MHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL128SAIF00 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ1G63EFR-PCB |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, J6 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4331 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=TP-LINK_2.4GHz_XXXXXX, TP-LINK_5GHz_XXXXXX |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=14:CC:20 |oui_eth=14:CC:20 }} {{TagLine|AC1750 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.tp-link.com/us/products/details/cat-5506_Archer-C8.html}} {{SupportPage|vendor=TP-LINK|model=Archer-C8_V1}} {{â€¢}} [https://www.tp-link.com/en/gpl-code.html GPL Code] {{See also|TP-LINK Archer C9 v1.x}} ===Reviews=== * [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32530-tp-link-archer-c8-ac1750-wireless-dual-band-gigabit-router-reviewed ''TP-LINK Archer C8'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :Noted as using BCM4708, 128MB RAM

CPU	Broadcom BCM4709	Broadcom BCM4708

2.4 GHz Broadcom BCM4360	Broadcom BCM4331
